review: It is equivalent to a Samsung Smart TV but a little faster. If you have a Smart TV do not get this device.

review: I cannot believe something this small and easy to use works so great! This is probably the best thing I have bought in years. I cannot say enough good things about it. Took 2 minutes to install, takes up the space of a CD cover, works PERFECTLY and at last I have something in my house that listens to me! How great is this?
author: Linda Lou

review: Amazon fire tv is Awesome thats all i can say about it just awesome
author: Shawn Carter

review: Amazon Fire is fast and easy to use. The voice search option is very convenient and, as so many others have stated, it actually works! I may be easily entertained, but I'm amazed at how well it understands what I say. I really have no complaints with this device whatsoever, and am grateful for all the good reviews that convinced me to buy it. I'm not techno-savvy at all, and have to rely on the kindness and experience of better-informed strangers when it comes to purchases like this.
author: Java Mama

review: Absolutely awesome product. My heart started beating just a little bit faster as I plugged it in and whispered to myself "Bye Bye Comcast; Here comes the future of TV". So easy to set up. I take that back: I didn't have to set it up. Literally and figuratively plug and play. Voice search is an absolutely brilliant. Well done, Amazon! And hey, why didn't I dump Comcast sooner?
author: X. Li

review: love it…. way better than rival wifi boxes, voice command is the kicker, tag your prime account and I am seriously thinking of ditching cable

review: LOVE LOVE LOVE Amazon Fire... OMG!  My cable company isn't going to be happy when I seriously downgrade our "rip-off" movie channels that I am going to cancel. I say "Robert DeNiro" and all his movies pop up onto the screen... LOVE IT, since I forget movie titles
